resources.string: Sleep sensing and home automatione\n quipment give you energetic sleep,\n Secure every day.
The device does not support Bluetooth
APP Bluetooth function requires BleScan permission for Android 12, do I need to open the setting page?
By precisely assessing the sleep stage you’re in, Sleep Analyzer helps you to monitor recovery during your night:
During deep Sleep, breathing slows and muscles relax. This phase helps you recovery from physical fatigue, and enables learning and memory consolidation.
Most of your dreams happen in REM (Rapid Eye movement) Sleep. REM is very important for emotion regulation and memory consolidation
Light Sleep is physiologically important but the least restoration of sleep stages. You are easily awoken during this stage.
Sleep analyzer breaks down your night in 6 meaningful indicators with color-coded feedback to clearly identify the dimension of your sleep that can be improved

Track the number of snoring episodes and their durations. In the app. Learn more about snoring patterns and waht impact them.

 To give your a complete and accurate overview of your snoring episodes, our exclusive snoring algorithm has been trained against a dataset of low to heavy snorers. A wide variety of unwanted noises has been included in this data set: subway noises, partnber snoring, washing machine noises,etc (描述需要修改)

 Sleep analzyer can also distinguish your snoring patterns from envriomental noises and your partner’s snoring patterns.

Continous Heart Rate Tracking The Sleep Score was developed with sleep physicians to build a specific algorithm that reflects the physiological importance of each metric for the body during sleep Know how to intepret your HR with color-coded feedback and get tips to improve it.
